author: MarcP

review: Total waste of time...If you want to watch HBO Go... it doesnt work.  You need to download apps to watch any video.  I thought there was a problem with my HBO Go app when i touched the Chromecast button and it said:  Searching for Chromecast.  ...until I downloaded the terrible YouTube App (that Google owns) and hit the Chromecast button, and video started streaming instantly.  Returning this product!  When did Google turn into Apple?!  I dont want to download apps to stream tv, and i dont nee the youtube app.  piss off.
author: R. Reynolds "rreynolds9"
